thread.section_title: Triple Crown Products Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Triple Crown Products | triplecrownproducts.com
thread.title: Jessica Hogan
thread.title_full: Triple Crown Products reviewed by Jessica Hogan

author: Jessica Hogan
title: Jessica Hogan
text: At first I was a little worried that once again I wouldn't get what I ordered but after the representative called me they sent my jacket straight out within 2 days. It was the wrong size so they sent another one and let us keep both. Amazing service and I had a great experience with this company! Would definitely recommend to anyone!
